companies.name: Avalara
companies.companyDescription: Leading SaaS provider of tax compliance solutions, serving 30K+ businesses globally

overview.description: Leading API-first tax compliance solutions for global e-commerce, driving multi-million dollar ARR through major platform integrations. Focus on developer experience, platform scalability, and strategic partnerships.

achievements.title: Global Tax Compliance App for Shopify
achievements.description: Led end-to-end development and launch of Avalara's tax compliance application for Shopify's global merchant base.
impact: Generated multi-million dollar revenue stream through strategic partnership
Achieved double-digit YoY direct ARR growth
Significantly reduced merchant integration time
Implemented automated tax determination for 40+ countries

achievements.title: Tax Returns API Enhancement
achievements.description: Led product improvements for tax returns API across major e-commerce platforms
impact: Expanded integration portfolio across Square, Squarespace, and Amazon
Strengthened market leadership in e-commerce tax compliance
Dramatically improved catalog processing speed through AI-driven classification
Unlocked mid-market segment through strategic partnership with leading SMB platform
